head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths WINSTON, LESLY, OF FORT LEE

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths WINSTON, LESLY, OF FORT LEE

block.p: WINSTON-Lesly, of Fort Lee. Beloved wife of the late Joel. Cherished daughter of Ruth Gordon and the late Philip. Devoted mother of Randy, cherished mother-inlaw of Laurie, loving grandmother of Tricia, Phillip, and Elizabeth. Services ''Wien & Wien,'' 129 Engle St, Englewood, NJ, Wednesday, 10AM. 1-800-322-0533
